label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: Release edge-24.4.4 contains an important fix for a Gateway API issue and is recommended over edge-24.4.2.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed a panic issue with the service mirror controller when listing mirror services and continued work on upcoming IPv6 support.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Allowed setting policy controller resources via Helm, separate from the destination controller.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Enabled relabeling metrics to customize handling of high-cardinality metrics.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added the linkerd diagnostics profile command for visibility into which ServiceProfile is attached to a given address.
